Essmote AI is a NextJS boilerplate for building AI SaaS startups.

branding.title: Essmote AI is built on the shoulders of giants

introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is Essmote AI
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: Essmote AI is a NextJS boilerplate for building AI SaaS startups. Built in a variety of templates and components.

items.title: Ready-to-use Templates
items.description: Choose from dozens of production-ready AI SaaS templates to quickly start your project.

items.title: Infrastructure Setup
items.description: Get instant access to scalable infrastructure with best practices built-in.

items.title: Quick Deployment
items.description: Deploy your AI SaaS application to production in hours, not days.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Why Choose Essmote AI
benefit.label: Benefits
benefit.description: Get everything you need to launch your AI startup - from ready-to-use templates to technical support.

items.title: Complete Framework
items.description: Built on Next.js with authentication, payments, and AI integration - everything works out of the box.

items.title: Rich Templates Library
items.description: Choose from various AI SaaS templates to kickstart your project - chatbots, image generation, and more.

items.title: Technical Guidance
items.description: Get dedicated support and join our developer community to ensure your successful launch.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Launch with Essmote AI
usage.description: Get your AI SaaS startup running in three simple steps:

items.title: Get Essmote AI
items.description: Buy Essmote AI with a one-time payment. Check your email for the code and documentation.

items.title: Start Your Project
items.description: Read the documentation and clone the code of Essmote AI. Start building your AI SaaS startup.

items.title: Customize Your Project
items.description: Modify the template with your data and contents. Specific AI functionality needs.

items.title: Deploy to Production
items.description: Deploy your project to production with a few steps and start serving customers immediately.

features.sectionSubtitle: AI-powered application document services tailored for your success

personalStatement.title: Personal Statement (PS) Generator
personalStatement.description: From brainstorming to final draft, AI-assisted throughout to create a personal statement that showcases your unique strengths.

resume.title: Resume (CV) Generator
resume.description: Intelligently adjust resume content and format based on target positions and schools, ensuring every resume perfectly matches requirements.

coverLetterSop.title: Cover Letter/SOP Generator
coverLetterSop.description: Professional cover letter and statement of purpose generator to help you clearly express your motivation and demonstrate your fit.

nativeTeacher.title: Native English Teacher Review
nativeTeacher.description: Experienced native English teachers provide professional polishing to ensure your documents are authentic, fluent, and academically appropriate.

freeRevision.title: One Free Revision per Document
freeRevision.description: We promise one free revision service for each document, striving for perfection and excellence.

aiHumanPolish.title: AI + Human Dual Polish
aiHumanPolish.description: Combining AI intelligent analysis with professional human review, double assurance of document quality for the best application materials.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Essmote AI
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us anytime.

items.title: Is it safe to use AI for essay writing? Will it be detected?
items.description: We provide an assistive tool rather than a replacement for writing. Essmote AI helps you organize your thoughts and optimize expression, while the final document remains created by you, ensuring originality and uniqueness. We also implement anti-AI detection optimization to minimize risks.

items.title: What's the difference between Essmote AI and general LLMs like ChatGPT?
items.description: Essmote AI is deeply optimized for study abroad application scenarios, with a rich database of successful essays and proprietary algorithms. Compared to general models, our output is more professional, more aligned with application logic, more natural in expression, and better meets admissions officers' expectations.

items.title: What if I'm not satisfied with the generated content?
items.description: Each document comes with one free revision. After generation, you can submit revision requests and we'll optimize and polish based on your feedback. Note: Generation quality depends on how specific and complete your input is. We recommend providing detailed background, experiences, and goals for better results.

items.title: How does human editing work?
items.description: We have professional essay editors familiar with North American and UK university application standards. They adjust tone, logic, and details to make essays more natural, fluent, and aligned with admissions officers' reading preferences.

items.title: Is my essay data secure?
items.description: We take data security seriously. All essays are encrypted for storage and won't be accessed or leaked without authorization. Users can delete their essays at any time to ensure complete privacy control.

items.title: Which schools and programs does Essmote AI support?
items.description: Essmote AI covers mainstream study abroad countries and most common schools and programs. Our model has strong generalization capabilities and can generate customized content based on your specific requirements.

items.title: Can I control the direction of generation?
items.description: Yes. You can specify writing style and highlight specific experiences or achievements you want to showcase. The AI will adjust according to your instructions to generate content that better meets your needs.

items.title: Can I use both AI generation and human editing together?
items.description: Yes. You can first use AI to quickly generate a draft, then have human editors provide secondary optimization, creating a dual guarantee of "AI efficiency + human quality."

items.title: Can I just use human editing without AI?
items.description: Absolutely. Our human editing service is independent. You can directly submit your existing drafts or essays for teacher editing and optimization.

items.title: Are the editors native speakers?
items.description: Yes. Our editors are all native professionals familiar with North American and UK university writing and admission standards. They provide optimizations that best match target institutions in terms of language habits, logical structure, and cultural expression.
